scripts.esm:
sh -c 'cat > dist/live.esm.js << EOF
$(cat src/live.js)
export default htmx
EOF
'
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run esm && npm run minify && npm run compress
scripts.test:chrome: playwright install chromium && web-test-runner --config web-test-runner.config.mjs --browsers chromium --playwright
scripts.test:firefox: playwright install firefox && web-test-runner --config web-test-runner.config.mjs --concurrency 1 --browsers firefox --playwright
scripts.test:webkit: playwright install webkit && web-test-runner --config web-test-runner.config.mjs --browsers webkit --playwright
scripts.test:all: playwright install chromium firefox webkit && web-test-runner --config web-test-runner.config.mjs --concurrency 1 --browsers chromium firefox webkit --playwright
